forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 67F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 23C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 73F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low near 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear early then increasing cloudiness overnight. Low near 60F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 24C. E winds shifting to SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 76F. E winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 57F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 18C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low near 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 64F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 54F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 65F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 65F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 67F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 67F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.
